summary: This mod will make your Frost look more like Shadowfax from LOTR. Bright white horse without saddle.
descriptionHtml:
Q- What this will do?
A- It will make horse Frost bright white with white glowing eyes (similar to Shadowmere).

Q- This is another Shadowfax mode?
A- The name of the horse is still Frost, but you can pretend it is Shadowfax.

Q- Why there is no saddle.
A- To let you pretend it's Shadowfax :P. Seriously I just don't like vanilla saddles in Skyrim. If that's a problem to you, use "Convenient Horses" mode and get yourself any saddle you want.

Q- Why you even made this?
A- Vanilla Frost was not unique enough for me. So I decided to make him unique (more like Shadowmere, but for light characters).

[b]Compatibility:[/b]
Convenient Horses COMPATIBLE!
Also compatible with anything that do not touch Frost. If you use any of those and want to use them, put my mod last in the load order.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Use NMM! As simple as that. Alternatively you can replace Shadowmere if you like. Use optional download for this.
author: mluppov
